io.confluent.ksql.rest.server

Class LagReportingAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.confluent.ksql.rest.server.LagReportingAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HeartbeatAgent.HostStatusListener

    public final class LagReportingAgent
extends java.lang.Object
implements HeartbeatAgent.HostStatusListener
    Agent responsible for sending and receiving lag information across the cluster and providing aggregate stats, usable during query time.
